jobs.title: vp, cnslt apps prog - front end engineer

desc.copy: Employed as a VP, Cnslt Apps Prog, I am a front end engineer who primarily works within a client facing transfer of assets section of Merrill Lynch. Additionally, I collaborate in research and development efforts in a company style guide.

list: Individual front end contributor to www.mymerrill.com and www.merrilledge.com
Create UI mock ups from existing front end components.
Develop and refactor gulp tasks to optimize less files into finalized css files to be served in production.
Presented the idea of a companywide style guide at bi annual innovation summit.
Develop client side handlebar templates consuming data passed from backend developers.
Work with backend developers to get stub json data to mock service calls so development of handlebar templates can run in parallel of the backend api being built.
Develop css using less.
Structured less files to make imports easier to read/follow.
Created POC of a styleguide utilizing vuepress as a static site generator.
Participated in daily standup, quad sessions, story grooming sessions, sprint planning and sprint retrospectives.
Train junior developers about nodejs, expressjs, client side and server side handlebar template rendering, npm, jQuery.
Work with product owners to discuss UI options they have to when new features need to be implemented.
Utilize Rally/Jira for story tracking.

desc.copy: Employed as a JavaScript Developer, I am responsible for delivering front end web solutions for clients of Brooks Bell using primarily Adobe Target, as well as Optimizely and Monetate. Serving as the tech lead of Adobe Target mentoring a team of junior developers.

list: Facilitated Adobe Target campaign launches
Implemented A/B Testing strategy for high volume Adobe Target campaign pushes
Wrote a/b tests for SunTrust, Barnes & Noble, Toys R Us, Uber, American Express, Clinique, Nickelodeon and Oppenheimer Funds
Train and mentor Junior/Intermediate level developers dom manipulation, modular javascript, css, a/b testing process, Adobe Target
Adobe Target SME. Train developers and project managers on how to use Adobe Target
Utilized Optimizely and Monetate as content delivery networks for a/b test scripts
Utilized git version control
Implemented code review process for Junior/Intermediate developers
Preformed code reviews for Junior/Intermediate developers
Interviewed candidates for full-time positions from a technical perspective

desc.copy: Employed as a software developer, I was responsible for daily content updates, projects, a/b test development and analytics.

responsibilities.copy: front end developer on the fed team
list: Contributor to a team of developers and worked along side business partners to successfully implement an A/B testing process
Research, analysis and development of front-end solutions and enhancements to lowes.com within a Kanban framework
Develop solutions on top of Adobe Experience Manager (Adobe CQ, Adobe Test & Target, Adobe Recommendations, Adobe Sitecatalyst, Adobe Dynamic Tag Manager) to support business needs
Agile SCRUM Development environment
Utilize Atlassian Jira for agile project tracking
Utilize Atlassian Confluence for documentation
Utilized git version control
Lead developer of A/B Tests on www.lowes.com and m.lowes.com utilizing Adobe Test and Target
Advanced Integration between Frontend and Backend services using JSON and XML
Contributor of analytics tagging on www.lowes.com and m.lowes.com utilizing Adobe DTM
Broke down code for non-technical clients, provide extensive Q/A knowledge and testing, and manage tasking for our team
Contributed to Lowes.com redesign, released in 2016
Lead developer for front-end implementation of promotions and static content updates, site wide, released on a daily cadence
Debugged and provided solutions for impediments and small enhancements to lowes.com and m.lowes.com using Charles Proxy, HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, handlebars and nodejs
Participated in daily standup, quad sessions, story grooming sessions, sprint planning and sprint retrospectives
Worked with others to develop and utilize user chat implementation for lowesforpros.com and lowes.com using Adobe DTM, live-person, javascript, html and css
Mentor and Train Junior level developers
Interviewed candidates for full-time positions from a technical perspective

desc.copy: During freelancing, I worked on a number of websites and side projects. These ranged from local pizzeria's to small weather app side projects.

list: Design and develop, as well as provide creative copy for static websites
Specializing in HTML / CSS / Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator
JavaScript (jQuery) / AJAX to build the front-end
Created email marketing campaigns
Created advertisements for both the web and print
